EcoSpark.description: An educational platform dedicated to climate justice and renewable energy awareness. EcoSpark empowers teachers and students with hands-on learning experiences and interactive resources focused on solar energy and sustainability.

Food Journal.description: A community-driven platform for food enthusiasts. Powered by AI, Food Journal provides personalized recipe recommendations and connects users to their community and to top recipe sources.

Translation App.description: A mobile app that allows users to translate from one language to another. Has features such as speech to text and vice versa.

Student Retention Analyzer.description: A comprehensive machine learning endeavor that involves data preprocessing, model training, and performance evaluation. This project includes various machine learning algorithms, thoroughly evaluated for accuracy, precision, and recall.

My Portfolio.description: A custom website that showcases my projects and experience.
